text.div:
Generated Narrative: Requirements CHE.FXREQ.002.G

Profile: SGRequirements

These requirements apply to the actor All Users

extension.valueString:
Provide a modular approach to the solution to accommodate variations required to make the solution country-specific, for example: 
- ability to use/not to use personal identifiers for registration 
- include a focus on symptoms/diagnosis that may appear in a country-susceptible manner (malaria, HIV)
- treatment modules that may be available in the country/setting (e.g. oral only vs injections)
The registration and consultation process includes what is more likely required without by-passing questions that are not required

extension.valueMarkdown: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Provide a modular approach to the solution to accommodate variations required to make the solution country-specific, for example: - ability to use/not to use personal identifiers for registration - include a focus on symptoms/diagnosis that may appear in a country-susceptible manner (malaria, HIV) - treatment modules that may be available in the country/setting (e.g. oral only vs injections) so that >The registration and consultation process includes what is more likely required without by-passing questions that are not required
